title: Thursday Post Show (6-10-21)
itunes:title: Thursday Post Show (6-10-21)
description:
Bobby, Amy and Eddie come to you from a different studio because our main studio was having some major issues. Bobby talks about the rehearsal dinner coming up and why Eddie has a problem with it. A new study says we may be able to laugh ourselves out of depression. Bobby also updates on if his Dancing with the Stars partner Sharna is coming to the wedding.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
